org.morphml.channelml.schema
Class StdpSynapse

java.lang.Object
  org.morphml.channelml.schema.DoubleExponentialSynapse
      org.morphml.channelml.schema.MultiDecaySynapse
          org.morphml.channelml.schema.StdpSynapse

public class StdpSynapse
extends MultiDecaySynapse

A synaptic mechanism implementing basic Spike Timing Dependent Plasticity based on Song and Abbott, 2001 Extends MultiDecaySynapse

Java class for StdpSynapse complex type.

The following schema fragment specifies the expected content contained within this class. 

 <complexType name="StdpSynapse">
   <complexContent>
     <extension base="{http://morphml.org/channelml/schema}MultiDecaySynapse">
       <sequence>
         <element name="spike_time_dep" type="{http://morphml.org/channelml/schema}StdpDep"/>
       </sequence>
     </extension>
   </complexContent>
 </complexType>
